name: intertravel-qa-testing
description: QA Testing Tools for InterTravel System

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../app_cliete && npm install
scripts.start-all: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd app_cliete && npm run dev"

author: InterTravel QA Team
